医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
低脂纯素饮食每年可节省超过 500 美元根据负责任医学医师委员会发布的一项新分析，与包含肉类、奶制品和其他动物产品的饮食相比，低脂纯素饮食的食品成本降低了 16%，每年节省 500 多美元在 JAMA 网络公开赛中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Low-fat-vegan-diet-can-lead-to-a- savings-of-more-than-24500-a-year.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Low-fat-vegan-diet-can-lead-to-a- savings-of-more-than-24500-a-year.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cfffe22e-1e7f-4be5-b437-e4d949cb5899 Tue, 05 Sep 2023 15:54:36 -0400 Low-fat vegan diet can lead to a savings of more than $500 a year
性激素导致雄性和雌性小鼠肾脏的差异众所周知，女性肾脏对疾病和损伤的抵抗力更强，但男性不必绝望。南加州大学干细胞主导的一项新研究发表在《发育细胞》杂志上，不仅描述了性激素如何驱动雄性和雌性小鼠肾脏的差异，还描述了降低睾酮水平如何使该器官“女性化”并提高其恢复能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Sex-hormones-drive-differences-in-male-and-female-mouse-kidneys.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Sex-hormones-drive-differences-in-male-and-female-mouse-kidneys.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1dd3f775-2129-4897-8cd7-7d0686a15093 Tue, 05 Sep 2023 15:45:28 -0400 Sex hormones drive differences in male and female mouse kidneys
美国早产儿死亡率的种族和社会经济差距依然存在伦敦大学学院研究人员领导的一份新报告发现，美国不同社会经济地位和种族的母亲之间的早产和死亡率仍然存在明显不平等。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Racial-and-socioeconomic-gaps-in-preterm-infant-mortality-persist-in-the-Unites-States.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Racial-and-socioeconomic-gaps-in-preterm-infant-mortality-persist-in-the-Unites-States.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c6bdfd4c-a932-4ff7-9366-7bc4b90fe4fe Tue, 05 Sep 2023 15:38:00 -0400 Racial and socioeconomic gaps in preterm infant mortality persist in the United States
研究表明抗性淀粉如何减缓非酒精性脂肪肝的进展益生元抗性淀粉未来可能在非酒精性脂肪肝（NAFLD）的治疗中发挥重要作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Research-shows-how-pressive-starch-could-slow-down-progression-of-non-酒精-fatty-liver-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Research-shows-how-pressive-starch-could-slow-down-progression-of-non-酒精-fatty-liver-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=07428ac2-f0da-4e51-a596-f3bcf04a6c3b Tue, 05 Sep 2023 15:32:11 -0400 Research shows how resistant starch could slow down progression of non-alcoholic fatty liver disease
新研究可能揭示寄生虫菌株多样性如何影响恰加斯病的进展杜兰大学的新研究可能揭示寄生虫菌株多样性如何影响恰加斯病的进展和严重程度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/New-study-may-shed-light-on-how-parasite-strain-diversity-can-impact-Chagas-disease-progression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/New-study-may-shed-light-on-how-parasite-strain-diversity-can-impact-Chagas-disease-progression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=05d3d6f1-98e5-49f0-8751-f60871f0e128 Tue, 05 Sep 2023 15:27:48 -0400 New study may shed light on how parasite strain diversity can impact Chagas disease progression
密歇根大学护理与健康研究学院获得 NIH 2357 万美元资助加入 ECHO 项目迈阿密大学护理与健康研究学院 (SONHS) 获得美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 前所未有的 2357 万美元拨款，用于加入环境对儿童健康结果的影响 (ECHO) 计划。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/UM-School-of-Nursing-and-Health-Studies-receives-242357M-NIH-grant-to-join-the-ECHO-Program.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/UM-School-of-Nursing-and-Health-Studies-receives-242357M-NIH-grant-to-join-the-ECHO-Program.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=030a9a89-dc0a-4845-9e26-fa9409a91db4 Tue, 05 Sep 2023 15:24:41 -0400 UM School of Nursing and Health Studies receives $23.57M NIH grant to join the ECHO Program
更好的身体欣赏与更高的心理健康相关英国安格利亚鲁斯金大学 (ARU) 领导的一项新研究表明，拥有更积极的身体形象与更好的心理健康和生活满意度密切相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Greater-body-appreciation-linked-with-higher-psychological-wellbeing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Greater-body-appreciation-linked-with-higher-psychological-wellbeing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7e09e6c0-a491-46ed-8ecc-efb8d9f91f47 Tue, 05 Sep 2023 15:17:56 -0400 Greater body appreciation associated with higher psychological wellbeing
新工具可诊断 16 个月大的儿童自闭症今天在《美国医学会杂志》(JAMA) 和 JAMA Network Open 上同时发表的临床研究结果表明，测量儿童的观看行为可以高度准确地预测 16 至 30 个月之间儿童自闭症的专家临床诊断。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/New-tool-can-diagnose-autism-in-children-as-young-as-16-months.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/New-tool-can-diagnose-autism-in-children-as-young-as-16-months.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d4ffc1fa-71a0-4d34-949c-a9b4afd9ca6d Tue, 05 Sep 2023 15:04:06 -0400 New tool can diagnose autism in children as young as 16 months
研究显示，医生评估的主动脉瓣狭窄严重程度与临床结果相关凯撒医疗机构的新研究表明，诊断出的主动脉瓣狭窄严重程度与临床结果密切相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Physician-assessed-aortic-stenosis-severity-correlates-with-clinical-outcomes-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Physician-assessed-aortic-stenosis-severity-correlates-with-clinical-outcomes-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b880773-f4a7-4964-acbd-adcc439c468c Tue, 05 Sep 2023 14:58:22 -0400 Physician-assessed aortic stenosis severity correlates with clinical outcomes, study shows
靶向 ORAI1 钙通道可以提供治疗口腔癌的新方法纽约大学牙科学院研究人员领导的一项发表在《科学信号》杂志上的新研究表明，一种重要的蛋白质作为钙进入细胞的看门人，会促进口腔癌的生长并产生疼痛。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Targeting-the-ORAI1-calcium-channel-could-provide-new-approach-to-treating-oral-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Targeting-the-ORAI1-calcium-channel-could-provide-new-approach-to-treating-oral-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2e4f05ec-6455-426d-9da0-f8e8c9ae0887 Tue, 05 Sep 2023 14:54:15 -0400 Targeting the ORAI1 calcium channel could provide new approach to treating oral cancer
